name: @uipath/codedapp-tool
description: uipcli plugin for coded web applications

scripts.build: bun build ./src/tool.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node --external commander --external signal-exit && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node --external commander --external signal-exit
scripts.build:full: cd ../cli && npm run build && cd ../codedapp-tool && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build:full
